subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Manager Terry Collins said that despite his excitement, he was uncomfortable with Johan Santana’s pitch count on June 1, 2012, en route to the Mets’ first no-hitter.
snippet: Manager Terry Collins said that despite his excitement, he was uncomfortable with Johan Santana’s pitch count on June 1, 2012, en route to the Mets’ first no-hitter.
